bibl.title: Antiphon the Athenian. Oratory, Law, and Justice in the Age of the Sophists.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. The Sophistic Period. - 2. Antiphon: Life and Works. - 3. Truth [see in part. pp. 63-65: The Papyrus Fragments]. - 4. Concord, Dream-Interpretation. - 5. The Tetralogies. - 6. The Court Speeches. - 7. From the Sophists to Forensic Oratory. - Pp. 183-187: Appendix A. Truth: The Papyrus Fragments; - 189-194: Appendix B. Concord: The Fragments. - Abbreviations and Works Cited. Indices.
bibl.seg: GAGARIN Michael, Antiphon the Athenian. Oratory, Law, and Justice in the Age of the Sophists.
Austin, University of Texas Press, 2002, 8°, xiv-222 pp. ISBN 0-292-72841-7. $40.

Introduction. - 1. The Sophistic Period. - 2. Antiphon: Life and Works. - 3. Truth [see in part. pp. 63-65: The Papyrus Fragments]. - 4. Concord, Dream-Interpretation. - 5. The Tetralogies. - 6. The Court Speeches. - 7. From the Sophists to Forensic Oratory. - Pp. 183-187: Appendix A. Truth: The Papyrus Fragments; - 189-194: Appendix B. Concord: The Fragments. - Abbreviations and Works Cited. Indices.

C.R. par P. Woodruff, OSAPh 26 (2004) pp. 323-336 [concerne aussi: Gerard J. PENDRICK (Edited with Introduction, Translation, and Commentary by), Antiphon the Sophist. The Fragments (Cambridge, 2002)]. - Danielle Allen, CR N.S., 54 (2004) pp. 310-312 [concerne aussi: Annie HOURCADE, Antiphon d'Athènes: une pensée de l'individu = Figures illustres. 2 (Bruxelles, 2001)]. - Craig Cooper, Gnomon 77 (2005) pp. 398-402. - G. Veneciano, Ordia prima 2 (2003) pp. 206-211. - Mauro Bonazzi, RSF 59 (2004) pp. 769-775. - Annie Hourcade, PhilosAnt 3 (2003) pp. 195-199. - D.C. Hoffman, Rhetoric Society Quarterly 36 (2006) pp. 339-342 [concerne aussi: Gerard J. PENDRICK (Edited with Introduction, Translation, and Commentary by), Antiphon the Sophist. The Fragments (Cambridge, 2002)].
